title: All Good Things Exposed
description: “All good things come to those who wait, Angel.” – Jace RushThe passion continues in All Good Things Exposed for Jace and Olivia as two shattered hearts take a leap into devastating realities without regard for consequence. In this contemporary erotic romance, Jace and Olivia continue their journey of two wounded souls determined to become one. Olivia realizes she can’t live without Jace in the same moment Jace recognizes she needs him in much the same way she needs water. The domineering side of Jace takes a stand in the moment before it’s all too late and he whisks Olivia away to the only place he trusts to protect her. In his arms. In his bed. In his house. Bared and exposed – every secret is laid out for judgment and every shame is set out to heal. In the end, after the final revelation, can the two lovers prevail?
author: Alannah Carbonneau
